website_summaries.verdict: Made of 18/8 stainless steel, this oversized 15" splatter screen is sure to cover every pan in your kitchen.
pros: Fits oversized pots, pans, and woks
Keeps the stove top mess to a minimum
Works great with large cast iron skillets
cons: Handle seems to warp away from the screen over high heat

customer_reviews.title: Did not stop grease
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for when my husband fries burgers and chicken on our stove top. This did not stop grease from coming out, at all. Our stovetop was covered in grease after cooking burgers on the first time using it. I returned it. It is constructed well, but the mesh is not fine enough.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: keeps most grease in
customer_reviews.text: this screen fits my fifteen inch lodge cast iron pan perfectly. I used it to cover my frying bacon. worked great. The screen has a welded handle. you need to be careful with it. I believe the weld could break if you got careless using it. I love that it fits such a large pan. if you have a fifteen inch lodge mine is fifteen and 1/4 this screen will work. Amazon packed this screen carefully arrived safe and sound no dents not misshapen . PERFECT!!!!!. one other thing if this screen ever caught on fire could be grease was to hot grease got on the screen. Hot grease will catch anything on fire so be careful
customer_reviews.author: D. Cederquist

customer_reviews.title: Looked everywhere for a Spatter Screen this large...
customer_reviews.text: And of course – found it on Amazon! This one seems pretty good and I’m so glad it fits my 14” Frying Pan with room to spare. I’ve only used it a couple of times but so far so good. Sure cuts down on the greasy mess and is easy to clean up by hand. Haven’t put it in the dishwasher but I’m sure it would be fine. Glad I purchased this.
customer_reviews.author: KathleenTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: After 4th wash I am seeing rust around perimeter
customer_reviews.text: Does the job for the price. My one complaint would be it appears to be rusting after the 4th use. Somewhere i read on here that it covers the lodge cast iron skillet without issue. Dont believe the hype. It fits but not perfectly enough to cover entire pan. Hopefully rust wont get too bad after another 4 washes
customer_reviews.author: Prototype Collector

customer_reviews.title: Piece of Junk
customer_reviews.text: This splatter screen is flimsy. It's totally inadequate. It has no bracing or "feet" as my 13" splatter screen has. It wobbles around in the air. Difficult to clean because it will bend too easily. My 13" screen has lasted for 20 years. This 15" screen won't make it more than two months if I bother to even use it again. I should have paid attention to the reviews, but I was desperate for a screen to use with my largest skillet. Since no one makes a good 15" screen, I'm going to have to try to make something for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie V

customer_reviews.title: Elegance Through Simple Functionality
customer_reviews.text: This is not designed to spank your rascal. Neither is it designed to slide a pizza out of the oven, so disregard those critics who claim it is "flimsy." It is a screen to place over the top of your spattering pots, and is perfectly robust for the occasion. The construction is excellent, the welding rates a "B+" in my book. It is what it says that it is, and it does the job that it claims it does. AND it's big enough to fit all of my pots and skillets. Five Stars, but if you plan on using it as a fan at the next Mardi Gras, opt for something else.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Balzoa

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money !!!
customer_reviews.text: First time using this the frame buckled to where it was no longer flat on the surface of the pan. Makes it useless.Could not return due to the fact I didn't use right away and time ran out.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Great size!

customer_reviews.title: Too big for the dishwasher
customer_reviews.text: With a fine mesh screen, I want to be sure it is clean of all grease. Hand-washing just doesn't sterilize it like a dishwasher. While the product is good and prevents normal splatters (but does let some through), it's multi-layering causes issues with hand-washing. I wish it would come it a 12 inch diameter.

product_meta.title: RSVP International Endurance (SPLAT-15) splatter Screeen, One Size, Fine Mesh Stainless Steel, 15" in Diameter, 6.25" Handle, Keeps its Shape & Construction Over Time, Dishwasher Safe
product_meta.description: Double-fine 18/8 stainless steel mesh splatter screens with 6-1/4 " stainless steel handle. Dishwasher Safe.
feature_bullets: Prepare fried foods cleanly and safely using our endurance 18/8 stainless steel splatter screen to cover your oversize pots, pans and woks up to 15-inches in diameter; the double fine-mesh of our splatter screen contains hot oil splatters inside the pan keeping your kitchen and cooktop free from grease, while protecting you from grease burns when cooking

It’s easy to cook perfectly crisp fried foods at home using our splatter screen because it allows the steam to escape when frying, and you can see through the mesh and closely monitor the cooking process to achieve the desired result

Our Endurance Double Fine-Mesh Splatter Screen is EXTRA LARGE at 15-inches in diameter, with a handle that is 6-1/4-inches long to allow the splatter screen to sit perfectly on over-sized fry pans, cast-iron fry pans, wide stock pots, Woks and non-stick skillets; comfortable long handle keeps hands safely away from heat and hot oil, protecting your skin and safeguarding your clothing from stains and messy grease; handle stays cool alleviating the need for special potholders or mitts

Made of durable, thick mirror-finish 18/8 double fine-mesh stainless steel that keeps its shape and construction over time; superior quality, design and performance for long lasting use, and it’s versatile as a steamer or strainer
Stores easily in narrow spaces and it’s dishwasher safe for easy clean up
